entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character in the story, a wizard who is being chased by Death Eaters. He casts a jinx to slow down one of them.

entities.name: death eaters
entities.description: A group of dark wizards who are chasing Harry. They are closing in on him.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is a gamekeeper at Hogwarts and a friend of Harry's. He is trying to help Harry escape from the Death Eaters.

entities.name: impedimenta
entities.description: A jinx cast by Harry to slow down one of the Death Eaters.

entities.name: the seven potters
entities.description: An event in which seven people are being protected from Death Eaters. It is not clear what this event is or how it relates to Harry's situation.

relationships.description: Harry is being chased by the Death Eaters.
Hagrid is trying to help Harry escape from the Death Eaters.
Harry casts the Impedimenta jinx to slow down one of the Death Eaters.
One of the Death Eaters is affected by Harry's Impedimenta jinx.
